## Validation Checklist
- [ ] Validated against schema (JSON structure is correct)
- [ ] HTML limited to allowed tags (`<p>`, `<ul>`, `<ol>`, `<li>`, `<b>`, `<i>`, `<br>`, `<blockquote>`)
- [ ] Keywords: 6–14 tokens; mixed TR+EN; semicolon-separated
- [ ] Header: 48–80 characters
- [ ] Content short: ≤ 120 characters, no HTML
- [ ] Status is `DRAFT`, `IN_REVIEW`, or appropriate for lifecycle
- [ ] Review stub added/updated under `reviews/<id>.review.json`
- [ ] All required fields present
- [ ] Dates in ISO 8601 UTC format
- [ ] Image path is HTTPS
